name: Mind Force
overview: Mind Force can be played with one or two players. The aim of the game is to collect spheres. Each sphere gathered increases your score. The faster you collect all items, the more bonus points will be awarded to you. To finish one level, you have to gather everyone. Each level has been designed that there is only one or two correct ways to solve it. So have a good look at the level before you start. But beware: don't miss the plates or your life will end.
